title: Sources of Fossil Carbon in the Atmosphere

content.question: Which of the following contributes to global climate change through the direct release of carbon dioxide into the atmosphere?

choices.label: Use of foams and packing materials that contain chlorofluorocarbons
Generating electricity at a nuclear power plant
Transporting products from one continent to another on a cargo ship
Growing fast-growing crops in open fields

content.answer: Transporting products from one continent to another on a cargo ship
